name: Bear Bear Wong‘s Logo | Golden Ratio Gride
description:
This presentation shows how to design my profile LOGO. I used Golden Ratio and Fibonacci Numbers to generate a series of circles, and make them into a grid. Then I design my Typography "bear bear wong"(shorten "b.b.wong") in some situation.

Let's press "Like❤️" button. I will enlarge or update my design file anytime and you will see and duplicate it. No bad, right?


用到了黃金分割線框設計，以及 Fibonacci 數列生成的圓形為基本單位，並做了一些能應用在其他場合的角標等設計，算是一個較為方便用於個人視覺形象識別使用的模板。

按下“❤️”，我會隨時更新這個設計文件，也方便你隨時查看和複製，大家共同進步。


My Figma Community Page: figma.com/@bearbearwong

My Behance Page: behance.net/bearbearwong

My Website: bearbearwong.github.io
